snippet.title: Bad Boys Do it Better – Opening Movie
snippet.description:
The only girl in an all-boys school!?
 
◆Story◆
You’ve been transferred to a high school with a dorm.
But it turns out to be… a former all-boys school full of delinquents?! 
“You may be a girl, but who cares?”

Everywhere you look there are boys, boys, BOYS!
Be the envy of every girl! 
Start your life as the lone flower among them!
